name: Amorphous Vase
description:
[Amorphous Vase]

In the design/construction I use 3D modeling software to develop a completely unique form for each vase.

I use a set of pre-established design parameters that allow for these completely unique shapes to be created. These parameters also afford the ability for the vase to still remain functional while retaining these custom shapes as well as a high level of manufacturing efficiency.

So, in short:
Each vase is completely unique and will never be duplicated.

The dimensions of the vase are 18"H x approximately 5" Dia.

The vase is stacked plywood in a natural finish with a wax sealer. The vase has an elastomeric sealer inside so it is safe to use with water.

name: Nesting End Tables - Natural Finish
description:
This item is a stacked plywood nesting end table in a natural finish.

In the design/construction I used 3D modeling software to analyze the cutting of the material to allow for minimal material wastage. I was able optimize the size that the tables would become. The dimensions of the outer table are 23"L x 15"H x 12"D.

I use a cnc router to cut individual pieces of plywood that are then laminated together so that the end grain of the plywood becomes the aesthetic feature. Through the lamination process the table becomes incredibly strong. The table is then sanded and finished. The finish shown here is natural by use of a food safe natural wax sealer.

See attached image for some alternate finishes that are available.

Finishing options:
Wax Finished (with food safe butcher block wax):
Natural Finish
Mahogany Brown
Washed White
Ebony Black
Dark Brown

Lacquer Finished:
Natural Finish
Mahogany Brown
Washed White
Ebony Black
Transparent Silver

name: Twist Concrete Vase
description: The twist in the 'Twist Vase' was refined through many digital prototypes using 3D modeling software. A cnc router is used to mill the formwork out of foam. An extremely dry mix of concrete is then placed into the formwork and left to cure allowing the rough texture to develop.

name: Simple Coffee Table - Washed White Finish
description:
This item is a stacked plywood coffee table.

In the designing/construction I used a 3D modeling software to analyze the use of material so that there is minimal material wasted and through this inquiry I was able optimize the table's size. The dimensions of the table are 36"L x 15"W x 12.5"H.

I use a cnc router to cut individual pieces of plywood that are then laminated together so that the end grain of the plywood becomes the aesthetic feature. The laminated plywood is then sanded and finished. Washed White finish is shown here.
